entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Drayton Valley
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 10. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 10. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Tuesday 14 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Mainly cloudy. High zero.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness early in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High zero. Wind chill minus 15 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Tuesday 14 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Clearing late in the evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 3 in the evening and minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Tuesday 14 February 2023
